name: Limited Impression About Rebecca (Alpha version)
description:
Limited Impression About Rebecca is a detective game about finding your own truth by chatting with people and knowing gossip and rumor. You are a detective writer who wants to write a book about a young girl Rebecca who died 2 years ago and figure out why the suspect Antony, Rebecca's boyfriend was announced as not guilty in the trial.

AD to move, W to run Tab to see interactable items. You can also drag items to do the investigation.
